TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeNodeTypes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the different node types (leaf, parent, and root) in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TreeNodeTypes enumeration is used to represent the different node types that are available in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control. The following table describes the three different node types.
|Node type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Leaf|A node with no child nodes.| |Parent|A node with a parent node and one or more child nodes.| |Root|A node with no parent node and one or more child nodes.|
The TreeNodeTypes enumeration is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations. For example, to represent the parent and leaf nodes, you can perform a bitwise `OR` operation on the Parent and Leaf values.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property uses the TreeNodeTypes enumeration to represent the node types that display check boxes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control. When it is set to a value other than the None value, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node type, which allows users to select multiple items from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the TreeNodeTypes enumeration to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control should show a check box for each of the parent and leaf nodes only.
[!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_406_1.aspx)] [!code-cs[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_406_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes All = int32(7)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes Leaf = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A node with no child nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes Parent = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A node with a parent node and one or more child nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes Root = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A node with no parent node and one or more child nodes.
